page.title: 17Employment around Llangunllo
page.content: The majority of male workers (16) are employed on small_family farms, working their own or parents land; five other men work on farms. Three small builders employ three more men (one of the builders employes his two sons); Two of the three teachers work in Presteigne (Secondary) and the third in London,commuting fortnightly. Llandrindod Wells provides jobs for two local government employees and two factory workers; Knighton employs two shop assistants, two office workers and a solicitors clerk. On epublican, one shop owner, one post_office clerk, one heavy_goods vehicle driver and a butcher working in Knighton make up the rest of the working population.Two more people are employed.Most women in the village have no paid employment and, ignoring school children, most other inhabitants are retired.
